title: Episode 41: Could Alex Pass Property To Buster? & Bank History
description:
Our legal analyst, John Snyder, discusses the latest maneuvers over Alex Murdaugh's assets. John explains a legal move that Alex might use to protect his son. Hampton bank CEO, Russell Laffitte, was fired for allegedly giving Alex an illegal loan. We talk to Hampton native, historian, and genealogist, Sara Holstein Graves about the history of Palmetto State Bank, and the Laffitte family's involvement.


Support this podcast at — https://redcircle.com/the-murdaugh-family-murders-impact-of-influence/donations
